this works!!! no viruses or spy/adware! only thing is that in the 1st install folder, just to clarify the instructions, when trying to install the 2nd thing in the "intall this 1st" folder, if it ways somthing about changing your "turn on or off features..." thing, press ok, and then dont change settings, install the 3rd file instead. its only there if the 2nd doesnt work

This does 100% work. However, there are a couple small issues.

It does not come with any video fx or transitions as mentioned above. Also, it seems to not be able to import as many types of video files as it should. It only wants to import .avi files for me. It's not that big of a deal for most people, just get a converter.

If anyone knows how to get the missing plugins, please say so.
